name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and stir for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. In a pan, sauté garlic and vegetables. Mix in pasta and marinara sauce. Serve with parmesan.

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pot. Add onions, garlic, and ginger. Add spices and vegetables. Cook until vegetables are tender. Serve with rice.

name: Veggie Burger
instructions: Mash beans and mix with breadcrumbs, spices, and chopped vegetables. Form patties and cook in a pan until golden. Serve in buns with toppings.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds. Stuff with rice, beans, and spices. Bake in the oven for 30 minutes at 375°F.

name: Vegetarian Tacos
instructions: Cook black beans with spices. Warm tortillas and fill with beans, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese. Serve with salsa and sour cream.

name: Grilled Vegetable Skewers
instructions: Thread chopped vegetables onto skewers. Brush with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill until vegetables are tender and slightly charred.

name: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in a pot. Add beans, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve with sour cream and cheese.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Mix with chopped vegetables, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve chilled.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Heat oil in a pot. Add onions, garlic, and vegetables. Add broth and simmer until vegetables are tender. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add sliced chicken and cook until browned. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and stir for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a pan, cook ground beef until browned. Add onions, garlic, and marinara sauce. Simmer for 20 minutes. Serve with spaghetti and parmesan.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pot. Add onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add spices and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with spices. Warm tortillas and fill with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese. Serve with salsa and sour cream.

name: Grilled Chicken Skewers
instructions: Thread chicken pieces and vegetables onto skewers. Brush with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill until chicken is cooked through.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add cooked rice, peas, carrots, and soy sauce. Stir-fry for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions. In a pan, cook chicken until browned. Add cream, garlic, and parmesan. Simmer until sauce thickens. Toss with fettuccine and serve.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season fish with spices and cook in a pan until flaky. Warm tortillas and fill with fish, cabbage, and lime crema. Serve with salsa.

name: Beef Chili
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in a pot. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Add beans, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve with sour cream and cheese.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill chicken breast and slice. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan. Top with grilled chicken and serve.
